How might we scale the impact of our work?

Christina Xu and Gary Chou, Winter 2019
Participants of the Teach the 1K program at Orbital brought together entrepreneurship teachers, coaches and activators.

What is this. Why we launched this. What the whole point was.

This was our attempt at explaining to people what we've done. It was also a forcing function to figure out how to contextualize our work.
